      • addDays

        public static java.util.Date addDays(java.util.Date date,
                     int numberOfDays,
                     boolean resetTime)
        Parameters:
        date - input date to add days to
        numberOfDays - if number of days is less than 0,the number of days will be removed from the input date
        resetTime - if true date is reset to beginning of the day
        Returns:
        date after adding the number of days

        date - input date to add days to

        Returns:
